page.title: 06HOSPITALS
page.content: ALTNAGELVIN HOSPITAL was opened in{ {1959. It was built in an L SHAPE but {has recently been expanded }and it serves a large area around {DERRY}. A statue of {PRINCESS MACHA }stands outside the hospital. The story of {PRINCESS MACHA }is a legend . She was the greatest runner in{ULSTER. }At that time strangers came and ,to impress them the {ULSTER} nobles forced her to run against a horse. Even though she was pregnant she was still forced . She managed to win the race but collapsed at the end. The women delivered two bouncing babies but the effort killed {MACHA}. With her dying words she cursed the noblemen of {ULSTER "When you most {need your strength you shall be as {weak as a dying woman ." { }
